title: Explained - Why Nvidia, Broadcom shares rose after Alphabet's capex announcement
description: Alphabet is one of several technology firms ramping up capital expenditure as they expand data center capacity to support artificial intelligence workloads.
content: Unlike many peers that rely heavily on industry-standard Nvidia processors, much of Google’s AI software runs on its in-house TPUs. The company’s latest flagship model, Gemini 3, was trained using these proprietary chips. Broadcom works with Google o... [2560 chars]

title: Texas DPS plans to increase surveillance over next 5 years
description: The plan largely involves the use of artificial intelligence tools, drones, flock cameras and other technology to react to crimes as fast as possible — in some cases, before they even happen.
content:
The Texas Department of Public Safety has released their five-year plan for homeland security in the state, largely focusing on surveillance, prediction and preemptive law enforcement.
The plan largely involves the use of artificial intelligence tool... [4140 chars]

title: Software selloff continues as investors debate AI's existential threat
description: The recent downturn in global software stocks has investors on edge, pondering whether the fears surrounding artificial intelligence have been blown out of proportion. As new AI applications begin to reshape the industry, legacy software businesses are bracing for potential upheaval.
content:

title: Wisconsin lawmakers propose bill to classify AI as not human, ban AI marriages
description: Wisconsin lawmakers are proposing legislation to ban marriages between humans and artificial intelligence, clarifying that AI is not human.
content:
MADISON, Wis. (Gray) - Wisconsin lawmakers are proposing legislation to ban marriages between humans and artificial intelligence, clarifying that AI is not human.
“Technology must serve humanity not replace it,” said state Rep. Lindee Brill, R- Shebo... [1116 chars]

title: Selloff wipes out nearly $1 trillion from software and services stocks as investors debate AI's existential threat
description: The global landscape for software stocks is undergoing a dramatic shift as a selloff unfolds. Investors are now deliberating whether the market's response to the looming threat of artificial intelligence is a case of panic. As innovative AI applications begin to proliferate, established players find themselves under increasing scrutiny. The resulting market fluctuations are noticeably affecting valuations industry-wide.
content:
Investors were assessing on Wednesday whether a selloff in global software stocks this week had gone too far, as they weighed if businesses could survive an existential threat posed by artificial ⁠intelligence.
The answer: It's unclear, but AI's deve... [7121 chars]

title: Google's annual revenue tops $400B for first time, AI investments rise
description: SAN FRANCISCO — Google parent Alphabet on Wednesday reported blockbuster earnings, its revenue climbing as it invests massively in cloud computing services enhanced with artificial intelligence.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO — Google parent Alphabet on Wednesday reported blockbuster earnings, its revenue climbing as it invests massively in cloud computing services enhanced with artificial intelligence.
